messages.subject: Coference: Sheraton Hotel
messages.msgSnippet: I m sending this to all the unschooling lists I m a member of, so I apologize to the list owners. But many people who are planning to come may not yet be on
messages.messageBody:
I'm sending this to all the unschooling lists I'm a member of, so I apologize to the list owners. But many people who are planning to come may not yet be on the LiveandLearnConference@yahoogroups.com list, and I need this to go out to everyone!

I have a number of people who have reserved rooms at the Sheraton but who have not yet registered for the conference. We are having difficulties with a few of the rooms, so I NEED to know whether you are coming or not. I know many of you reserve your rooms in advance (because you know how fast they disappear! <g>) and then decide NOT to come at the last minute because of whatever reasons.

But this year, I have need of those rooms at the Sheraton if you are NOT coming!

Please e-mail me off-list kbcdlovejo@... as soon as possible so that I make the necessary changes.

Please feel free to forward this message on to other lists I am not on (RUL, for example, and other local lists).

Thanks so much!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
